summary: This is an email from a BuzzFeed News reporter to an unspecified recipient, dated August 10, 2019. The reporter is investigating a potential leak regarding Jeffrey Epstein's death, citing posts on 4chan that appeared 45 minutes before mainstream media reports. The reporter seeks verification of the information and a statement on the situation.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the reported death and the suspected leak. He is the central figure in the investigation mentioned.

persons.name: Reporter
persons.context: The author of the email, who is investigating a potential leak of information about Epstein's death from a paramedic, based on posts seen on 4chan.

events.title: Report of Potential Leak Regarding Epstein's Death
events.description: A BuzzFeed News reporter emails an unspecified recipient about suspecting a paramedic involved in responding to the Jeffrey Epstein call leaked information online, citing posts on 4chan that appeared 45 minutes before ABC News first reported Epstein's death.

keyFacts: A BuzzFeed News reporter suspected a paramedic involved in responding to Jeffrey Epstein's death leaked information online.
Posts containing information about Epstein's death appeared on the website 4chan 45 minutes before ABC News first reported it.
The reporter sought to verify the information in the posts and requested a statement on the potential leak situation.
